attributes.comment:
I am writing to oppose increases in CIS costs as it relates to adoption situations.
My husband and I have been working on our adoption process for an inordinate
period of time and are faced with delays an additional expenses. In particular, we
are orking with the China program. I believe that the U.S. government, with its tax
credit, attempts to support the adoption process and the moral commitment a
society has to support orphane children. I applaud their effort. My husband and I
happen to be in the rare circumstance to be able to afford this increase. Most of
the wonderful people that we have met along our adoption journey would find this
to be a real hardship. They have already made so many concession and borrowed
from family and friends to fulfill their dream. An approximate $1,000 increase just
may keep a lot of these lonving couples/individuals from adopting. Thank you for
your consideration in this matter.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Jane John
